article: How can you stop smoking? It is not easy to stop smoking,but millions have  _  to quit and so can you Here are a few suggestions. Prepare yourself . Decide on a day to quit Don't choose a day that you know is going to be stressful, such as the day of an exam. Make a list of all the  _  you will get from stopping smoking. Then  throw away  your last packet of cigarettes. Be  _  . Every time you feel like smoking a cigarette,  _  yourself that you are a non-smoker.Reread the list of benefits you wrote earlier. Break the habit Instead of smoking a cigarette,do something else. Go for a walk,clean your teeth drink some water, clean the house;in fact,do anything to keep your mind and  _  your hands busy. Relax. If you start to feel nervous or stressed,do not reach  _  a cigarette .Try some deep breathing instead. Do some relaxation exercise every time you feel stressed. Get help if you need it. Arrange to stop smoking with a fiend so you call talk about your problems,or Join a stop-smoking group .If you feel  _  ,you might like to talk to a doctor or chemist about something to help you,like nicotine chewing gum. Keep trying. Do not be disappointed if you have to try several times before you stop smoking. If you  _  and have a cigarette,do not feel ashamed .Just try again. You will succeed  _  .
